product_name: Topeak SideKick Wedge Bike Seat Pack
long_description: Tough and ready for the miles, the Topeak SideKick Wedge bike seat pack offers storage for your riding essentials in an easily-accessed, sturdy design. QuickClick(TM) mounting is a proprietary quick-release mounting system that allows fast and easy tool-free mounting; simply slide and click, and the bag is secure. Semirigid, weather-resistant saddle bag features molded side panels with a zippered sideways opening that offers easy access to contents. Interior features organizational pockets and allows instant access to your riding essentials, energy bars, keys and more. Rear-facing attachment point lets you easily affix a rear blinky light (sold separately). 3M(TM) reflective detailing on the Topeak SideKick Wedge seat pack increases your visibility in low light.
short_description: Tough and ready for the miles, the Topeak SideKick Wedge bike seat pack offers storage for your riding essentials in an easily-accessed, sturdy design.
